OOC: My pathetic post. Don't mind me, I just wanted to show I'm alive.

BIC=
:

Deemos approaches and watches silently, somehow looking both proud and u=
pset simultaneously. The reason for this was unknown, but Deemos had always=
 been a disturbed robot anyway. Spider walks up and appears very excited. A=
rrow is nowhere in sight.

Spider: I just hope I can be great enough one da=
y for this team. As great as I am, that task may be impossible.

Deemos: I =
sacrificed my honor and became a traitor, and there was no turning back. I =
paid my dues through hard work and became a leader of a small ill fated fac=
tion and I'm still not great. I don't think you know what greatness is.

Hi=
s sight never strayed from Phoenix while speaking to Spider.

Spider: Yeah.=
.. Yeah.

The furious Spider tries to pretend Deemos doesn't exist for a mo=
ment. He tries to hide his resentment of what Deemos said, but is unable. H=
e appears really immature, but he was a young bot and very arrogant...

  -=
